header.title: Before the Session
header.paragraph: Have any questions or concerns? Feel free to [ask](/contacts/).

list.title: Parking Matters
list.paragraph: Our vans are 8 ft by 19.5 ft and love a flat space.

list.title: Over Communication is Key
list.paragraph: Share any special requirements, health, and behavioral details with your grooming professional.

list.title: Cancel with Care
list.paragraph: Please provide a 24-hour notice if plans change.
